snippet: The Senate candidates in North Dakota are courting voters in a state where the economy is healthy, mainly because of a booming oil and gas industry.
abstract: Brief biographical sketches of Republican Rick Berg and Democrat Heidi Heitkamp, who are locked in a tight Senate race in North Dakota.
lead_paragraph: The Senate candidates in North Dakota are courting voters in a state where the economy is healthy, mainly because of a booming oil and gas industry.

headline.seo: In North Dakota, a Competitive Contest for Senate
